pkgmetadata.longdescription: flake8-diff===========.. image:: https://readthedocs.org/projects/flake8-diff/badge/?version=latest :target: http://flake8-diff.readthedocs.org.. image:: https://travis-ci.org/dealertrack/flake8-diff.svg?branch=master :target: https://travis-ci.org/dealertrack/flake8-diff.. image:: https://coveralls.io/repos/dealertrack/flake8-diff/badge.svg?branch=master&service=github :target: https://coveralls.io/github/dealertrack/flake8-diff?branch=masterRun flake8 across a set of changed files and filter out violations occurring only on the lines that were changed.
